entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
